strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_EXECUTIONER_DESC: Defeat an enemy by dealing 1000% of its max health in damage.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_EXECUTIONER_MASTERY_DESC: As Executioner, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon or harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_EXECUTIONER_GRANDMASTERY: As Executioner, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon or harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_EXECUTIONER_WASTELANDER_: As Executioner, open the ancient gate on Abandoned Aqueduct.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_EXECUTIONER_ELECTRO_DESC: As Executioner, defeat an Overloading Worm using Execution.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_EXECUTIONER_SWINGAXE_DES: As Executioner, slay 12 enemies in a single use of Execution.
